website_summaries.verdict: Made of human-grade mattress materials, this option delivers superior support and comfort for old or achy joints. Large dimensions make this a solid choice for big cats or slumber buddies.
pros: Sleep surface is made of ultra-thick orthopedic foam to cushion and support joints
Overstuffed bolsters make a comfy pillow for cats who need to keep their heads elevated while sleeping
Low front allows for easy entry
Extra size is perfect for large breeds or for multi-cat households
cons: Removing the cover for washing can be a chore

customer_reviews.title: not really washable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these beds several months ago. They are not used often, but when I needed to wash them I tried to remove the cover .... the bottom unzips and reveals 2 smaller zippers to open the bolsters. They are filled with a brown loose filling (see picture). There is no way to completely take the entire over off to really wash these beds. These were not cheap, but I purchased them because they are washable. I am not will to put that mess in my washer. not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christine T

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but size is a little misrepresented. I tried to gauge from multiple reviews on people with large breeds to see if this was big enough and opinions seemed split 50/50. I decided to give it a shot for my 90 lb boxer/American bulldog. It claims sleep surface is 25 inches wide, but not really, if you take away the overlap from the bed bumpers. I took pictures to give you a good size reference. It’s soft and cushiony, I love the feel of the fabric and the grey is really pretty. You can tell it’s really well made and will definitely last. Unfortunately, we are still on the hunt for a big boy bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not As Big As You Might Think
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this because it was just too small for our two year old Samoyed. The measurements 34 in x 24 in x 10 in, but you could barely see it under our dog. The ad states the size as large. Maybe it is this big with the bolsters crushed down and bulging out. The bed does look very nicely made and our dog would have loved it if she would have fit. Lastly, the seller refunded $15.xx on a $48.xx purchase, calling it a restocking fee. Knowing all of this up front, we definitely would have purchased locally.
customer_reviews.author: CapeCod

customer_reviews.title: While the bottom of the bed is easily removable, the bolsters are not as they are ...
customer_reviews.text: While the bottom of the bed is easily removable, the bolsters are not as they are loose fill. So, washing this bed is a challenge. Also, after pre-treating, a trip through the washer and then more treatment after the washer, this still smells of the accident that caused it to be washed in the first place. If it can't come clean, it's of no use - a shame for the money I spent and the landfill it will end up in. The bottom cushion is not very thick or dense - not close to what I expected based on the description. On another note, this is made of a very shiny, cheap-looking material. Not a fan of that aspect, either.
customer_reviews.author: CRB

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed we’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these beds now, one for each dog. They are the best-constructed dog bed I’ve seen (and I looked at dozens) — the egg-crate mattress zips into the bottom of the bed and is very substantial; the bolsters are also substantial, and the bed is soft and comfy inside and out. Dogs love them.
customer_reviews.author: voracious reader

customer_reviews.title: best dog bed for up to 50lb dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have two of these beds and really love them! They are 50 pound dogs and fit into these beds perfectly curled up and sleep in them all night long. They like this kind of bed because they like to rest their head on the side like a pillow. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: This bed is fantastic. Arrived exactly as described/pictured
customer_reviews.text: This bed is fantastic. Arrived exactly as described/pictured. Picking up my female golden puppy this weekend and will update the review after she has had a chance to use it! Seeing it in person, this would be good for medium sized breeds 30-60lbs. It might be on the small size for an average full-grown golden retriever, but if my pup takes after her mom, around 55-60lbs, it should be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: R678

customer_reviews.title: Bottom is too thin.
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed for our almost 15 year old Beagle mix. She loves a bolster style bed and I assumed she would love this one. Alas she just doesn't like it and prefers her old bed - it is actually a huge 60 inch diameter round bed with a memory foam mattress and a second smaller one on top. Our other dogs will use this bed off and on, but none of them really seek it out. The bottom is simply not thick enough and you can feel the hard floor underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs & Horses

customer_reviews.title: A Winner at Last for our Senior BC
customer_reviews.text: Jeep is 11+ and rejected the last two beds we bought for his old bones. I took this out of the box yesterday and he got in immediately. He still wants to lay around close to me wherever I might be, but when it was bedtime, he headed straight for his Serta and stayed there all night. It's nicely made, too, and I'm glad it can easily be washed (we'll find out how easy later I guess). Anyway, perfect size for a border collie!
customer_reviews.author: Robink

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesn't like
customer_reviews.text: My dog refused this bed, but she's kind of picky. I think, she doesn't like the sides. We bought her a flat, pillow style bed, and she's fine. I tried to return it, but Amazon was going to charge $21 for return shipping. 😳 What a lousy mistake I made. Besides all that, this bed is great quality and seems really comfy. I gave it to a friend and her great dane loves it, lol!!! She's slightly oversized (I wouldn't recommend it for this bed, haha), but she just curles up tightly.
customer_reviews.author: April T

customer_reviews.title: almost worst dog bed ever
customer_reviews.text: I thought these zipped apart to so you WASH them. NO THEY DO NOT! Only the very bottom layer zips out, but all those cushy sides that your dog will slobber on, lay on, and well, maybe have an accident on? TOO BIG to fit in a washing machine. So no, I'm just throwing away two of these as the window has closed to return. I'm completed disappointed. There goes $100.
customer_reviews.author: O.P.Utah

customer_reviews.title: Ortho foam not as thick as picture suggests
customer_reviews.text: The thick sides take quite a bit of the product dimensions but otherwise make dog who leans on side more comfortable. I ended up buying another ortho foam bed with cooling gel and a thicker foam that my dogs use more and ended up reselling this one. The foam got yellow tint for some reason and it was annoying if one was to take it apart completely due to the stuffing in the sides (if you have small, top loading machine it won't fit). Overall, it worked for the 4 months it was used but ended up finding a better option for us.
customer_reviews.author: denisa

customer_reviews.title: he seems to like it pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8 week old Chinese shar pei puppy. As you can see, he seems to like it pretty well. He sleeps in all angles in this. It's soft, and it unzips at the bottom to remove the foam mattress. The pillows on the sides do not remove and arent flimsy, so they stay up. He's been playing rough with it at times, chewing and scratching, but no tears or rips. Feels pretty tough and the material is good. The bottom has a no skid pad so it won't slide all over the floors. Overall I think it's a good bed. He crawls in it and is out in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPEST THING EVER
customer_reviews.text: While my dog does find this bed comfortable, it is not made well at all. The sides are filled with brown foam and the fabric is so flimsy that if a toenail touches it, it is very easily punctured and fun! Brown stuffing everywhere! The bottom of the bed is supposed to be non skid, but the tiny black rubber dots do not stay on the bed. It is not non skid at all, and I now have tiny black non skid dots all over my house. This would be a great dog bed if the stuffing was encased within another fabric beneath the exterior fabric and a totally rubber bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Difficult if not impossible to wash
customer_reviews.text: The dog bed is great if you never plan on washing it. The foam on the bottom of the bed is easily removed but the stuffing is not encased. If you want to wash the cover, you have to pull the stuffing out. The stuffing on this bed was actually stuck in the zipper. I really don't want the hassle of trying to stuff a dog bed back in a shape that is "acceptable" - AND - I'm not going to throw the entire bed in the washer/dryer. Other than the washing issue - it's a really nice dog bed - however I'm returning it. I won't have a smelly dog bed in the house.
customer_reviews.author: doggerfolk

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed I've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I've purchased and the only reason I needed a second one was because I left the first one behind at a boarding facility. This bed is truly amazing and has held up to daily use by a lazy dog that naps roughly 18 hours a day. It has just the right amount of firmness around the edges to provide that head support that my dog loves and the easy to remove cover is a dream come true. The first one held up for 4 years and was still going strong when it was unfortunately left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Cycling Junkie

customer_reviews.title: So nice I ordered another.
customer_reviews.text: Best $45 bed for your money. (At least right now before they raise the price). It has a lot of cushion, a lot of support in the bolster sides. It is very soft. Not super thin like the K&H one I recently bought. The K&H was a complete waste of money. And it was $80. This Serta bed is very nice. I would definitely recommend it. The Large fits my beagle and my lab /beagle mix. They cannot stretch out in it. It is a "cuddler" bed!
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bed
customer_reviews.text: It is made well, good quality, soft, heavy bed. We got it for a new rescue dog, the foster mom had the same bed. But with all the changes, she doesn't want to sleep in a dog bed and sleeps on the couch. So we have a extra bed now. But it is made well and is good quality. The first night or two she had a accident in the bed, and we had to wash it. It is a solid, firm bed so it filled up the washing machine but washed ok.
customer_reviews.author: smile

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed ever!  Granddog approved!
customer_reviews.text: My granddog Henry loved this bed from the first moment and even chose it over the sofa. His mom promptly ordered two more of these great beds. It looks better than any other dog bed I’ve bought. I bought the large size. Henry weighs about 35 lbs, for size reference. He has plenty of room so he can move around and sleep in different positions. He likes propping his head up and this bed accommodates that quite well. I like that the base mattress/cushion zips out so the bed can be washed. I would definitely purchase this bed again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Trouble keeping your dog out of your bed?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for my boxer puppy and he absolutely loves it! I am very satisfied with the quality of this product. Super soft, super cuddly, and most definitely supportive enough to keep him up off the floor. He actually sleeps in his own bed without any fuss. Before he would cry and whine until I let him into my own bed. With this bed he happily sleeps through the night without trying to sneak into our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Our boxer mix loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is cozy well made bed and has been a good size for our 50lb boxer mix. She seems to love it including the bolsters for resting her chin, and it provides enough cushion underneath with a very cozy fabric cover. It is a little bit of work to take it apart for washing (it's not all one connected bed under the outer liner, but for as frequently as we wash it... it's not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Melle12

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Don't attempt to take the pieces out and wash the cover, you will struggle to get the pieces back in. So frustrating, spend an hour trying to stuff it all back. Will not buy again. Seller was great, packaging was good, but I don't have the patience to try to fit all the pieces back in.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. So soft I want to sleep on it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr. old 15 lb. Maltese loves this bed sooo much! He ran after me when I took it out of the box and he hasn't left the bed since I set it down in his corner space--for hours now! I've never seen him so comfortable! It's a little big for him--not snug--but it's kind of nice that he has a little extra room around himself to roll around and not be stuck between the two walls. Highly recommended. Incredibly soft and sturdy too. Only con is that it takes up quite a bit of room in our small city apartment, but I don't really mind it too much.
customer_reviews.author: Blut Engel

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved it, and it was a really great size
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved it, and it was a really great size. It also has a zipper for easy cleaning. I only wish it came in other colors. They already have the sealy couch shaped one but the two smaller dogs prefer a cuddler so this was perfect. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Izi Barrett

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand for my dog beds
customer_reviews.text: I received item in a timely manner. I love this brand for my dog beds. They hold up good and cushion/foam does get float. I bought this bed for to keep in the living room, but I bought one similar about a year ago at Sam's for my pug and I have washed it more than a dozen times and it is still in good shape. I would recommend these beds to any one. If you go to Petco you are going to spend just as much and they don't hold up good.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy23

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves This Bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog crawled into this right away. She had knee surgery and has spent the past seven weeks confined in a pen during the daytime. The sides and back of her normal bolster bed had sagged. I wanted a bed that would make her comfortable when she has another confinement period (another knee surgery) after the first of the year. She appears to love this bed. I'd love to get her another one of these and I may purchase one to put in the laundry room for her before she has the next surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Ga Mtn PeachTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed but not at all durable
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bed and so do our dogs. It just doesn't hold up well at all. As soon as it gets a little hole it's done for. This one wasn't as good of quality as the first couple of these we bought. Lasted about 6 months before we had stuffing all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a corgi!
customer_reviews.text: My family dog Monte LOVES his new Serta bed. This is definitely a superior product - we tried to look for a cheaper one but honestly it's worth paying a little more so your dog will be cozy every day! It's larger than his last bed which lets him stretch out, and he loves to rest his head on the sides. The walls are really thick with plush!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Blankenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Not washable
customer_reviews.text: Washable?! Oh come on. The bolsters have lose hair like stuffing that yes have zippers to get to but what the heck do you do with it when you're trying to wash the cover? Past experiences, this stuff does not wash well so now it's portioned into pillow cases and I'm 100% dreading the refill process, so prep yourself for a sewing project so the bolsters are removable and you make this cover actually washable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, awesome dog bed. My 15 lb. Llaso Apso 18 year old dog loves it. The Serta cuddler pet bed with orthopedic egg crate foam base is super soft and very comfortable. It is perfect in depth so that she does not roll out of the bed as she did her old bed. Has a zipper that come off for machine washable. It is everything it said it was and even better than I had imagined. I highly recommend and I am very picky when it comes to my little 18 year dog. Cannot beat the price or find the same price even close in any pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie B

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BED FOR YOUR PUP
customer_reviews.text: This bed is awesome. Our newly adopted small dog was taking over our large labs bed (Serta, also, but huge), and often wouldn't budge nomatter what, unless, of course, I picked him up. We just got him this bed, and it's his dream place to curl up and sleep. He loves it. Being somewhat of a crazy person when it comes to my animals, I must say that this is one of the best beds ever. I would absolutely not pass this one up if you need a comfy dog (or cat) bed.
customer_reviews.author: SMT

customer_reviews.title: My Dog loves this bed
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed for my Chihuahua and he LOVES it. It is a bit big for him but that is fine, I put blankets in with him and he snuggles right in. Totally worth it. My only issue was with delivery. The amazon delivery person just dropped my package off at a random neighbors house. Luckily that neighbor was nice and brought it to me. Didn’t dock stars for that though cause the dog bed is legit awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are smaller than indicated
customer_reviews.text: The bed was wonderful in all aspects except the measurements were considerably smaller than listed in the description. I returned the bed because it was too small for my dog. If the correct measurements were listed, I would have known the size was too small for my dog and I wouldn't have purchased it n the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy; Get Larger Size
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolute loves it. She's 35 lbs but I ordered the next size up, a good thing because it's perfect for her. Has a smaller footprint than other dog beds I've used. I love the color, my old dog loves shape and padding. I'll update after I wash the cover.
customer_reviews.author: bookcat

customer_reviews.title: Dirty spots
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and I had to send one back and they sent another one and had to send that one back because again it had big dirt spots on it . The one that I ended up keeping had a dirt spot on it but I really liked the bed and just got annoyed with having to go to UPS so I kept it anyway. I'm in need of a new bed but afraid to buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dog bed. Fluffy and the pup loves it. I will say it’s a bit smaller than I thought for a large, but our shiba is on the smaller side, so it wasn’t a big deal to us. Just a word of warning, it seems small for even a medium size dog.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Item................... But!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well made product.......but very soft and fluffy........Dog disliked it!!! Item was sold by Sam"s Club.....good price but wrong color........item returned. Sam's made the return process very arduous!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr "D"

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves the bed, but quality is poorer than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves snuggling in this bed. She's a 50lb mixed breed and it's the perfect size for her. Unfortunately, with only about a week of use, the seam on the bottom that covers the egg crate foam has completely split open. Now the foam is completely exposed. I'm hoping I can just stitch it back together rather than going through the hassle of trying to ship it back to Amazon for a replacement. Hopefully no other seams decide to split!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Tore early but looks/feels nice.
customer_reviews.text: Cushion fairly soon after purchase. Very nice otherwise. If it wasn't for the tear would have given it 5 stars. Would consider buying again to give a second chance when this one wears out. Otherwise this one has a nice appearance.
customer_reviews.author: doclane2

customer_reviews.title: Not so large...
customer_reviews.text: The large bed is far from being large. The interior length of where the dog would be is only about 19 inches. I wouldn't buy this for any dog considered to be a "smedium" sized dog. The bed is extremely soft though, but calling the bed large is a bit of a stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Lex I.

customer_reviews.title: Best bed ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful bed for the price. Bought 2 for our dog. This bed is very washable. You just remove the bottom padding and throw the rest in the washer. The bolster padding will dry after being put in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: My 14 year old chihuahua loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my 14 year old chihuahuas birthday. She loves it!! My other chi and Jack Russell also tried it out but she let them know quickly it was all hers. She has arthritis and I felt she needed the orthopedic bed to help ease her pain. It is extremely well made! It looks more comfortable than my own memory foam mattress. Great neutral color. I will say though that "small" is quite large. It could easily fit all of my 3 dogs in it. My dog is around 8 pounds and this could easily fit a 25-30 pound dog.
customer_reviews.author: jessa carlyle

customer_reviews.title: Beloved beds for all ages and needs!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dog beds ever! I run an animal sanctuary and have had to make multiple orders for these beds as all the dogs prefer these. They are sturdy and well made, perfect for our arthritic and special needs dogs. We will be ordering more in the future, I'm certain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed
customer_reviews.text: Our Brittany has been sleeping between my husband and me in bed since the night we brought him home and were too weak to listen to his persistent crying from his kennel. He showed some interest in a similar Serta bed my dad had when we visited, so I decided to give this one a try. It's been a minor miracle. Since the bed arrived, our Britt has slept in it every night. He even jumped on our bed last night, seemed to remember that he had a comfortable bed of his own in the room, and jumped down into it. This bed is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: G.B.

customer_reviews.title: Serta orthopedic pet bed
customer_reviews.text: Love the make of the bed...here goes the but...it says 34X24X10....it is not even if you measure the puffy bolster it still is not...it even states on the tag that is the size...I'm not sure why it says that my tape measure reads 31x22x10
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved it! He loves all beds though but he definitely likes this style better since he rests his head on the sides and theyre stable and don’t get squished with his weight. Only reason it has 4 stars is because the bed came stained and the strands were lose and coming apart. Ordered a replacement and won’t be here for another month so my dog got his hopes up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Firm and great quality
customer_reviews.text: My dogs chewed previous beds and removed the stuffing, I think they realize that this is a special, fancy bed and haven’t chewed them! They love the firm sides so they can sleep with their head up on the “pillow”. Love the quality too
customer_reviews.author: Glynnis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, gets tons of use!
customer_reviews.text: We've got a Shiba inu, right around 22lbs. She adores this bed. She will prop her head on the sides, which are nice and firmly stuffed. She will also burrow deep into the bottom and snooze away. I love that the bottom isn't poly fill, and it's an actual piece of foam-this helps the bottom support stay nice and consistent. The cheaper beds with polyfill stuffed in the bottom tended to get lumpy over time. She's a little smaller than the bed, but that doesn't prevent her from stretching out when she wants to.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Bed Yet.  The Boxy Shape Helps Dog Feel Safe.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried about a handful of beds and this is the only one my dog will actually seek out and sleep in. He likes to prop his head up on the side or just curl up into a tight ball. I think the boxy shape helps him feel safe. I like it so much that I purchased another so there is one for home and office.
customer_reviews.author: HangOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed !
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these. They come apart and wash easily, and my dogs love them. Especially the sides that they like to lean against. I have two Boxer's and the Medium size works best. They're about 55 lbs each.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fredrik

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this bed
customer_reviews.text: When the 2 beds arrived, my 8 month old puppies immediately claimed them as their own. If dogs could talk they would have said "thank you." The beds are obviously very comfortable and the perfect size for my dogs of 18 pounds. They each have their own, but share one every now and then. How smart of Serta to make a dog bed!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Furry-soft, cozy, great size
customer_reviews.text: We got this dog bed because it was the only one that wasn't "couch" style while still being orthopedic and soft. Our dog likes beds that are a bit fuzzy, and she loves this one. The dogs are always trying to steal it out from under each other. So far the bottom is still nice and thick and soft. The edges are VERY puffy so be aware they take up space but our dogs love it as a head rest.
customer_reviews.author: AttackOfTheFries

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this bed was way too large when it arrived and to be fair the box it comes in is large, but my dog adopted it THE second he saw it and has never looked back. Perfect bed for a medium size dog.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 28 lb. heeler/whippet mix with creaky joints, and he seems to love the bed. He lays in it a lot more often than his old one. I like the color and it seems like a sturdy bed that will last for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Gray, got Blue.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gray one, they shipped me the blue one. My dog loves these, so the product is fine. Just beware you might not get what you order. One star off for the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: Mighty-M

customer_reviews.title: Hole with stuffing coming through
customer_reviews.text: Hole in middle of dog bed. I don’t know if it was caused by the tag, which I carefully snipped free, but there is a whole in the middle of the dog bed which had continued to grow and stuffing is coming out.
customer_reviews.author: PaintedPoppies

customer_reviews.title: My Boston Terrier loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My sweet Boston is aging and I wanted a new bed to accomodate him. After much research, I chose this Serta. He absolutely loves it and I have the peace of mind knowing it's kind to his joints. So very happy with this bed!
customer_reviews.author: HHW

customer_reviews.title: Awful to clean
customer_reviews.text: Soft and cozy. Large is perfect for our 20 pound shih tzu and our 8 pound poodle loves to sprawl out and utilize 3/4 of the bed. The problem came when trying to wash. You have to remove loose stuffing.. A lot of it! Not really doable if you want to wash the bed more than once in a long while. I haven't washed it and will just spot clean. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really soft
customer_reviews.text: We, and our pups, really like these beds so far. I wanted to provide pics for size reference. Our American bulldog is 65lbs and our English/American bulldog is 60lbs. They fit with no problem if they choose to curl, which is what they do most often. We're happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 70lb boxer-pit mix just the way he likes
customer_reviews.text: Anchovy, yes that is his name, loves to snuggle into this 4-sided bed like a wonton. I bought it for my smaller dog but she prefers to flake out on the XL piled with faux shearling fleece pads. As long as my fur pals are happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dangerous when CookingTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Very well made..
customer_reviews.text: The bed is very soft and the material is great. The bed it's self is quite large and very comfortable.. It is after all made by Serta.......
customer_reviews.author: denimc

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it, it could be more rugged though
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this bed! I've only had it for about 6 weeks and it's already getting holes in it, though. I wish the sewing was done for more rugged use seeing as this is for dogs. Aside from that, it's comfy and my dog loves cuddling up in it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: My dog sleeps better than I do. I am jealous.
customer_reviews.text: My dog looks so happy when he's in this bed he forgets to bark at the mailman. He also sleeps better than I do now, but he deserve it. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! .... but....
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this bed, and my dog (~45-50 lbs) LOVES it. The bolsters are awesome and it’s a great size for her. My only complaint is that when I received this item straight out of the box, it already had a hole in the fabric. Stuffing was poking through. I decided it wasn’t a big enough hole to make a fuss over, but still to purchase a brand new bed it should not have had ANY holes to begin with. So, just be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: Ripping apart after one month
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I did an exchange through Amazon. Process was easy and quick. The new bed seems to be much better! Revise from 3 to 4 stars. Unfortunately there are already holes in this bed with stuffing coming out after only about 1 month. The holes are on the back top pillow portion of the bed, where it's also splitting at the seam. So it's not due to digging or nesting. Other than that it's very comfortable for our pup, just wish it wasn't already coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Happy dogs
customer_reviews.text: Both dogs took to these beds immediately, as if they couldn't understand why I hadn't bought them sooner. One is a Doberman and the other is a Doberman/Poodle mix. Both weigh about 55 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 3 stars because it’s small bed for a large. My 17 week old labor is two big for it already
customer_reviews.author: JBanana

customer_reviews.title: Very nice size my pets love it
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, I wash on warm and dry on warm also allow to dry outside too. I do put a cover on them however just to help keep it clean longer because a blankets easier to wash on it
customer_reviews.author: NTingle

customer_reviews.title: Three holes already
customer_reviews.text: Our dog LOVES the bed with the tall sides. We've only had it a little over a month and it already has three holes in it. They are on the tall inside back. Not a place where any claws could have gotten. Our dog is old and pretty much just sleeps all the time. I sewed the first hole up as soon as I saw it and two days later, there are two more. The fabric is very soft but thin. I am very disappointed. Obviously it should last at least for several months before showing wear.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will love you forever!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing ! Very comfortable and perfect in size. I recommend purchasing this bed for your medium sized dog. Our pit bull is 40lbs and 36 inches long from nose to butt, not including her tail. If your dog likes to tuck themselves into tight spots to sleep, I highly recommend this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Shepeluk

customer_reviews.title: I got this bed because having a removable cover was ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed because having a removable cover was very important. The bottom zips and you can remove the bottom pad before washing. There is no zipper to remove the top bolster filler in order to wash the cover.
customer_reviews.author: A. Manuel

customer_reviews.title: I’m Iggy’s love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Italian Greyhounds love this bed. Being they’re on the thin side I figured they’d appreciated the extra comfort. They sleep in their beds everyday ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: My two large dogs love to curl up in this dog bed. They are such princesses that they sulk if the other is already laying in it. It collects fur in the tucked in corners but flip the bed right side out for easier vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa J.

customer_reviews.title: a little small
customer_reviews.text: I have a 50 lb mutt who loves to ball up in the winter. She likes this bed but I don't think she will like it as much once summer comes and she cant stretch out
customer_reviews.author: VolDuq

customer_reviews.title: Great for senior dog
customer_reviews.text: Parameter contains memory foam, main part of bed also memory foam, just not as thick as parameter.
customer_reviews.author: Wilshire Pack

customer_reviews.title: Good guality dog beds
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 westies and we bought 3 beds. The dogs love these beds. The beds are well made, nicely cushioned and nicely designed. The only reason I did not give these beds 5 stars is because I havent washed them yet. I will update my review once the bed (coverings) are washed.
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR A 50 LB DOG
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, the inside dimensions are much smaller then the outside dimensions. This was way too small for our 50 lb dog. NOT REALLY A LARGE DOG BED!!!! The bed would be great for a smaller dog, it is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMclovin2010

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but the best for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed! It is high quality and very attractive. My dog is a 40 pound mixed breed hound. The large bed is perfect for him. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maine penny pincher

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was the 2nd one I purchased. First was from Home Goods, payed same price as online listing. Color was exact as picture listed. Dog is happy so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Sparklers

customer_reviews.title: This bed is so beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so beautiful and comfortable. Daisy, my young, 65 lbs English Labrador Retriever sleeps in a crate by the side of my bed. The cuddler fits perfectly in her large crate. She was sleeping until now in a cuddler I had bought when she was a pup. She seems very pleased with the upgrade and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We have a mini doxie and she sleeps in this bed most of the day while at work. She seems to be comfy and also has a lot of room to bring her toys in the bed with her :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Very good and soft
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters Corgi. She loved it so did her Cute little dog. Highly recommend A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. St Jean

customer_reviews.title: You a already know serta is the best for humans
customer_reviews.text: My pug, who suffers from arthritis, had difficulty sleeping until I bought him this bed. He sleep peacefully now. You a already know serta is the best for humans; why not also for dogs?
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: Cuddly and good quality
customer_reviews.text: My 70lb dog fit perfect in this bed. She sleeps in it often and "cuddler" definitely describes this product accurately. The foam is thick and that is imperative for my dog who struggles with joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: BEST VALUE DOG BED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Serta makes the BEST dog beds for the money. my dogs chewed through dozens of dog beds from petco, marshalls, tj maxx etc....LOOK NO FURTHER. had the bigger version of this for about 2 years now and my dog loves it. this smaller cuddler version is also very good!
customer_reviews.author: JasonR

customer_reviews.title: I needed an excellent and affordable dog bed for my senior dog who ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed an excellent and affordable dog bed for my senior dog who deserves the best. The last bed I purchased for him lasted a few years and just broke down terribly. I wanted one with good support for his old bones and most importantly, he loves it! Plenty of room for him to change positions. Good price!
customer_reviews.author: K Norcross

customer_reviews.title: My little man loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Had a bed sleeper that we were trying to break him of that habit. He's 1/2 Cocker and 1/2 Boykin Spaniel and he fits perfect in it. He runs straight to it when going to bed. We all sleep better now.
customer_reviews.author: RORY V

customer_reviews.title: My 2 dogs love this bed.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Shih Tzu's love this bed. They love the size to play in it and gives them enough room to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Look for the hidden zippers!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality at a reasonable price. I didn't realize the foam was removable until I found the hidden zippers--it makes washing and drying the cover a lot easier, as long as you don't mind unstuffing and re-stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: Happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product. Also my pug is so big that it was hard to find one like this one. He fits perfectly at any angle.
customer_reviews.author: cannoli13

customer_reviews.title: 36 lb pit pup LOVES this cozy bed.
customer_reviews.text: Our 36 lb pit mix puppy loves this bed! She goes straight to it when we go upstairs. She loves to sleep curled up and it hugs her (size large bed). I agree with other reviewers that i wouldn’t really consider this bed “large”. Its probably best for medium sized dogs. It’s very soft and cushioned. Probably not that easy to clean. Took a while for delivery (~10 days total)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed But, Issues
customer_reviews.text: This my second one and it also damaged it has a hole in it . I love the big size for my min Schnauzer and the color just wish new one doesn't have issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dria

customer_reviews.title: Not a thick enough bottom
customer_reviews.text: The padding on the sides are fine. I’m disappointed that the bottom is half inch foam, and too soft to insure the bony parts of the dog are properly cushioned.
customer_reviews.author: Captainflygirl

customer_reviews.title: The puppies love it
customer_reviews.text: Two puppies like to use it at the same time. I did have to put a blanket in it so that they would use it
customer_reviews.author: Charleen Ann Haveron

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute but does not hold up!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is as pictured. Very cute, plush and comfortable. The cover zips off, however it is in sections so somewhat hard to manage. The bolster part is stuffed with what looks like brown hair. I know this because my dog ripped two big holes in the bolster in the first couple of uses. He sleeps in this in his crate and likes to dig a little to "nest". Mind you, he is a 35lb pointer mix. Not a huge dog. Very disappointed that a bed costing this much didn't last more than a few days.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my two Shih Tzus and they love it! I treasure my fur babies and I feel like I am spoiling them with this bed. It is very well made and even though I have washed it many, many times it still looks great. The picture I have included was taken today 11-1-2018 and it shows very little ware. The only thing I don't like is the fact that you have to remove all of the batting before you wash it but I do it because it is worth it. I will buy it again when the one I have wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Winship

customer_reviews.title: SOFT
customer_reviews.text: Just took it out of the box! SO puffy and comfortable, not as big as I pictured, but still will work and seems to be great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dog bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my puggle (pug beagle mix) she is about 30 lbs and it was the perfect size (bought size suggested for medium dog). This is an amazing value for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae Lechner

customer_reviews.title: Super plush
customer_reviews.text: My Galga loves it. Smaller than I thought but would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Antares

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is probably comfier than my own bed! Both of my cavalier king charles spaniels can sleep in this bed. They love to curl up and nestle inside of it. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsaKelly

product_meta.title: Serta Ortho Cuddler Pet Bed, Extra Large
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Color:GreyThe Cuddler's tall, plush bolster is designed to provide your pet with a sense of security and support. This inviting oasis is ideal for dogs who prefer to curl up while they sleep. The pressure-relieving ortho foam and quilted, plush sleep surface are to make your dog feel pampered and protected. DIMENSIONS Large Finished Dimensions: 34 x 24 x 10 inches, Sleep Surface: 24 x 16 inches, Base Foam: 29 x 20 inches Extra Large Finished Dimensions: 44 x 32 x 10 inches, Sleep Surface: 32 x 23 inches, Base Foam: 40 x 27 inches
feature_bullets: Pressure-relieving ortho foam provides superior comfort and support
Perfect for pets who curl up while they sleep
High quality pet bed made with upholstery grade fabrics
Assembled in the US with 100% CertiPUR-US foam
Machine washable cover features non-skid bottom

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
